title: Mobile-Based Industrial Design Innovation Strategy Intensive Short Course

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic industrial design theory and practical experience, along with digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Real-Time Collaboration and Innovation Methodology Application Utilizing Mobile Environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze industrial design trends and innovation cases to derive three actionable strategies for practical application.
Learners can complete asynchronous collaborative projects via mobile LMS platforms with over 80% completion quality.
Learners can develop one user-centered design solution using digital prototyping tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
